name: Castigate, Mass
book: Advanced Player's Guide. Copyright 2010, Paizo Publishing, LLC
target: one creature/level, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart.
text: This spell functions as castigate, except it affects many creatures.
target_zh: 每施法者等级1名生物，任意两名之间的距离不得超过30尺
text_zh: 该法术的功能如同严加斥责 (Castigate) 一般，不过它可以影响多个生物。
